contest-event.event-date:
March 27, 1976 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-fourth-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Test piece awards: 1st: Lillian Izon Memorial Shield and £6 music voucher 2nd: J. Gale Cup and £3 music voucher 3rd: Brass Band Shield
Own choice march contest also held: 1st: Kingsbridge Silver (180pts) 2nd: Sidmouth Town (178pts)
April 9, 2012, 2:13 p.m. April 9, 2012, 6:57 p.m.
1 Sidmouth Town Band R. Hibbs Four Little Maids
2 Kingsbridge Silver Francis Huxham
3 Totnes Juniors K. Peters
Unknown Result Hatherleigh Silver Band J. M. C. Nairn
Unknown Result Northlew and Ashbury P. O. Adams
Unknown Result Okehampton Excelsior Silver Band Reg Beardon
Withdrawn Hartland Town H. Dayman
Withdrawn Holsworthy Town Band J. R. Grand
